Buying funds through GFunds lets you invest in different financial products directly in the GCash app. Buy orders take a few days to process, so you won’t receive them immediately. The price of the fund, called the Net Asset Value Per Unit (NAVPU), is updated daily, not in real time.

### **How to place a Buy order in GFunds:**

1. On your GFunds dashboard, tap **Invest**
2. Select the fund you want to invest on and tap **Buy**
3. Input the amount you want to invest with the selected fund. Tap **Next**
4. Review the details of your investment and tap **Confirm.**

You’ll see a confirmation page indicating your Buy order has been placed.

Once submitted, you cannot cancel or modify your Buy Order. If your buy order is cancelled by the system or our partner, your payment will be refunded to your wallet within **2-3 business days**.
